characters: None visible in immediate vicinity, only vehicles
summary: In this segment, the self-driving vehicle is traveling on a multi-lane road during what appears to be late afternoon or early morning, indicated by the sky. The road is clear with good visibility. Initially, a white SUV is observed driving ahead in the same lane. As the segment progresses, another white SUV approaches from the left side of the self-driving vehicle and performs a standard left-side overtaking maneuver. The road is bordered by a median on the left and buildings and trees on the right.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed and direction throughout the segment. It continues to follow the white SUV ahead in its lane. When another white SUV approaches from the left and performs a left-side overtaking maneuver, the self-driving vehicle does not need to adjust its speed or direction. This indicates that the overtaking vehicle maintained a safe distance and trajectory, allowing the self-driving vehicle to continue its normal driving behavior without requiring evasive action or speed changes.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white SUV, approximately 10-20 meters ahead, driving in the same lane as the self-driving vehicle. 2) Left side: A white SUV, initially alongside on the left, then moving forward to overtake the self-driving vehicle.
